mapper.sql: SELECT * FROM (SELECT ROWNUM AS RNUM ,Z.* FROM (
mapper.select: SELECT GroupBy1.ACC_BILL_NET_AMT ACC_BILL_NET_AMT , GroupBy1.SUM SUM , GroupBy1.TASK_ID TASK_ID , GroupBy1.TASK_TYPE TASK_TYPE , GroupBy1.BILLING_YEAR BILLING_YEAR , GroupBy1.BILLING_MONTH BILLING_MONTH , GroupBy1.START_DT START_DT , GroupBy1.END_DT END_DT , GroupBy1.IS_INVC_GENRT IS_INVC_GENRT FROM ( SELECT Extent1.TASK_ID TASK_ID , Extent1.TASK_TYPE TASK_TYPE , Extent1.BILLING_YEAR BILLING_YEAR , Extent1.BILLING_MONTH BILLING_MONTH , Extent1.START_DT START_DT , Extent1.END_DT END_DT , Extent1.IS_INVC_GENRT IS_INVC_GENRT , SUM(Extent2.ACC_BILL_NET_AMT) ACC_BILL_NET_AMT , SUM(1) SUM FROM PAY0047D Extent1 JOIN PAY0016D Extent2 ON Extent1.TASK_ID = Extent2.ACC_BILL_TASK_ID WHERE 1 = Extent1.IS_CNFM GROUP BY Extent1.TASK_ID,Extent1.TASK_TYPE,Extent1.BILLING_YEAR,Extent1.BILLING_MONTH,Extent1.START_DT,Extent1.END_DT,Extent1.IS_INVC_GENRT ) GroupBy1 WHERE ( GroupBy1.BILLING_YEAR = #{year} ) AND ( GroupBy1.BILLING_MONTH = #{month} ) ORDER BY GroupBy1.TASK_ID DESC

SELECT Extent1.TASK_ID TASK_ID , Extent1.BILLING_YEAR BILLING_YEAR , Extent1.BILLING_MONTH BILLING_MONTH , Extent1.START_DT START_DT , Extent1.END_DT END_DT , Extent1.IS_INVC_GENRT IS_INVC_GENRT , SUM(Extent2.ACC_BILL_NET_AMT) ACC_BILL_NET_AMT , SUM(1) SUM FROM PAY0047D Extent1 JOIN PAY0016D Extent2 ON Extent1.TASK_ID = Extent2.ACC_BILL_TASK_ID WHERE 1 = Extent1.IS_CNFM AND ( Extent1.TASK_ID = #{taskId} ) GROUP BY Extent1.TASK_ID, Extent1.BILLING_YEAR, Extent1.BILLING_MONTH, Extent1.START_DT, Extent1.END_DT, Extent1.IS_INVC_GENRT

SELECT TAX_INVC_ID AS INVC_ID , TAX_INVC_CUST_NAME AS CUST_NAME , CASE WHEN S24.CUST_BILL_EMAIL_ADD IS NOT NULL THEN CASE WHEN S24.CUST_BILL_EMAIL_ADD <> S24.CUST_BILL_EMAIL THEN S24.CUST_BILL_EMAIL || '; ' || S24.CUST_BILL_EMAIL_ADD ELSE S24.CUST_BILL_EMAIL END ELSE S24.CUST_BILL_EMAIL END AS CUST_EMAIL , TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(TAX_INVC_CRT_DT, 'DD/MM/YYYY'), 'MON') || ' ' || EXTRACT (YEAR FROM TAX_INVC_CRT_DT) AS INVC_DATE , TO_CHAR(TAX_INVC_CHRG, 'L99,999,990.00', 'NLS_CURRENCY = ''RM''') AS CURR_CHARG , TO_CHAR(TAX_INVC_OVERDU, 'L99,999,990.00', 'NLS_CURRENCY = ''RM''') AS PREV_BAL , TO_CHAR(TAX_INVC_AMT_DUE, 'L99,999,990.00', 'NLS_CURRENCY = ''RM''') AS TOT_OUT , TAX_INVC_CUST_VA_NO AS VIRTUAL_ACC , TAX_INVC_REF_NO AS INVC_NO , '9928' AS BILL_CODE , TAX_INVC_BILL_PAY_REF_NO1 AS REF_NO_1 , TAX_INVC_REF_NO AS REF_NO_2 , 'billing@coway.com.my' AS COWAY_EMAIL FROM REP0099D R99 JOIN SAL0024D S24 ON S24.CUST_BILL_ID = R99.TAX_INVC_GRP_ID JOIN PAY0047D P47 ON P47.TASK_ID = R99.TAX_INVC_TASK_ID WHERE CUST_BILL_IS_ESTM = 1 AND CUST_BILL_EMAIL IS NOT NULL AND TASK_TYPE = 'BILL' AND EXTRACT (YEAR FROM TAX_INVC_CRT_DT) = #{year} AND EXTRACT (MONTH FROM TAX_INVC_CRT_DT) = #{month} ORDER BY TAX_INVC_ID
